trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true! Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S. These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted. Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 对，是真的！提交到HealthTap的健康问题会被提交到我们网络上的数千名美国医生。这些医生试图回答提交的每个问题。 那些没有被问过或回答过的，良好的， (容易被理解并且对整个HealthTap社区有用的)健康问题最有可能得到回答。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: (对于有全面健康保险的人来说，有一个低于典型共同支付的小额的费用，) 从而可以直接向HealthTap上您选择的医生询问私人问题。当您向HealthTap上的医生提交一个私人问题时，该医生有长达72小时回答这个问题。如果在该时间内未能回答您的问题，您将收到全额退款。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 要登录HealthTap，您必须先注册并创建一个帐户。执行此操作时，您将选择要使用的电子邮件地址和密码。您可以随时在设置中更改登录信息。如果您已经注册并且无法登录，请与我们联系。

trans-unit.source: To add other group affiliations to your HealthTap profile, edit your Virtual Practice page. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 要将其他组织成员添加到您的HealthTap档案，请编辑您的虚拟实践页面。了解更多 »
提供有用的答案：回答更多

trans-unit.source: Growing your network of patient and peers
trans-unit.target: 增长您的病人网络和同行网络

trans-unit.source: Accepting new private messages from patients

The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page. If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap面向医生服务的好处在我们的医生页面上有详细说明。如果您是美国认证的医生，您可以在线注册或下载HealthTap医生应用程序（iPhone，iPad和Android）。注册过程很快很简单 - 开始只需不到一分钟。在注册过程中，我们将要求提供信息，以验证HealthTap上的每位医疗专家都是具有良好信誉的美国执业医师。如果您在申请过程中需要帮助，请在联系我们的用户支持团队。

trans-unit.source: If you are a U.S. licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed doctor in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here
trans-unit.target: 如果您是美国持牌医生，您可以在线注册或下载HealthTap医生应用程序（iPhone，iPad和Android）。注册过程很快很简单 - 开始只需不到一分钟。在注册过程中，我们将要求提供信息，以验证HealthTap上的每位医疗专家都是具有良好信誉的美国执业医师。如果您在申请过程中需要帮助，请在联系我们的用户支持团队。

trans-unit.source: Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond! You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 一旦您有了您“闻名的”主题，您将可以在这里展示您在这方面的专业知识，并获得在你的街区，在你家附近，城市，国家甚至更远地方的#关注度！您可以通过做您最擅长的东西 - 帮助需要您专业知识的人，从而成为你所在的领域最好的一员。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: Adding a video to a Wellness page is a great way to inspire others to improve their health and well-being. Learn more here about our Wellness pages and how to submit your videos directly on HealthTap or via email.
trans-unit.target: 将视频添加到“健康”页面是激励他人改善健康的好方法。在这里了解我们的健康网页，以及如何直接在HealthTap或通过电子邮件提交您的视频

trans-unit.source: Get your free personalized app today! Download our mobile app. Or we'll make you your own
trans-unit.target: 今天就获取您的免费个性化应用程序！下载我们的移动应用。或者做出你自己的应用

trans-unit.source: %{span_start}Get answers to your health questions%{span_end}%{span_start}from over %{count} top doctors%{span_end}
trans-unit.target: %{span_start}从来自超过%{count}名顶级医生%{span_end}%{span_start}获取您的健康问题的答案%{span_end}
阅读更多的来自医生的答案

trans-unit.source: HealthTap will metamorphose from a Q&A site into a service that doctors, hospitals, or provider organizations will buy to manage their larger patient pools more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将从问答网站转变为医生，医院或提供者组织将更有效地管理其较大的患者库的服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap helps you 'prepare...to ask smarter questions when [you] get to the doctor's office'.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap帮助你准备...当你到达医生办公室时要问更直接了当的问题。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s Q&A service sees 7.5M uniques per month, with MDs spending an hour per session providing 581m answers.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的问答服务每月查看7.5M的独立问题，MD每次会话花费一小时，提供581万个答案。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap...appeal[s] to doctors who are willing to define their roles and organize their time differently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap...更愿意倾向于那些愿意个性化定义自己角色和工作时间的医生

trans-unit.source: Goodbye doctor's appointments and waiting rooms, hello HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到HealthTap, 跟去医院看病的烦恼说再见.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap 'just might make you raise both eyebrows in surprise'.
What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.
HealthTap 'gives consumers more control over their health'.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap '让顾客更好的管理自己的健康'.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was created 'to engage people in their health and to help them live healthier, happier lives'.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的任务是让人们活的更加健康更加精彩

trans-unit.source: [Increasing] its network of doctors available to answer patients' questions online, Palo Alto-based HealthTap is acquiring Q&A site Avvo Health.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得更多医生来帮助患者在线解决问题', HealthTap收购了Avvo Health.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap isn't the only service that puts real doctors on your computer screen or on your smartphone, but it's the best we've seen
trans-unit.target: HealthTap并不是唯一一个让你把医生带在身边的服务, 但是她是迄今为止最好的在线医疗服务

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Unveils Micropayment System and Doctor Chat
trans-unit.target: HealthTap推出小额支付系统和医生聊天

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is Your Personalized Health Source
HealthTap is...involving physicians in the conversations and by personalizing information to each person's individual needs.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap让你在和医生面诊时更加私人订制

trans-unit.source: HealthTap distinguishes itself from other health education websites by having practicing physicians answer the consumers' questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过让执业医生回答消费者的健康教育， 这和其他在线医学教育网站完全不同

trans-unit.source: Trust is the cornerstone of HealthTap.
HealthTap aims to harness the mobile revolution to bring the house calls back into vogue - albeit virtually.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在利用可携带设备浪潮将家庭电话医生带回流行

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Adds App Suite, Doctor Consults via Text
trans-unit.target: HealthTap添加应用套件, 和医生通过短信会诊。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Takes Q&A with Your Physician Mobile.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap让您和您的医生随时随地的问答。

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap] brilliantly shows the diversity of the medical community by allowing different physicians to answer the same question.
trans-unit.target: [HealthTap]通过允许不同的医生回答同样的问题，显示出医疗社交网络的多样性

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is providing tens of millions of people with tailored health answers that will ultimately help save lives.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在为数千万人提供量身定制的健康答案，帮助拯救生命。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is taking the first step to bring personalization to digital health by providing you and millions of others with access to more detailed health answers.

什么让人们感觉特别健康

trans-unit.source: Bill Ericson has been working with startups his entire career as a founder, key advisor, counselor and investor. He believes that entrepreneurship drives the American economy, and that the best venture capitalists see their role as supporting and challenging entrepreneurs to their best performance. Bill’s current investment focus is the big data revolution that is driving the commercial, consumer media, and healthcare worlds. Bill serves on the Board of Northwestern University School of Law and received his B.S.F.S. from Georgetown University of Foreign Service and J.D. from Northwestern University School of Law. MDV has over $1.4 billion under management and partners with entrepreneurs to architect and build successful companies. MDV invests in businesses that address significant challenges and opportunities, including personalizing medicine. MDV-funded companies that have gone public or been acquired include: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).
trans-unit.target: Bill Ericson一直与创业公司合作，他的整个职业生涯都是作为创始人，关键顾问，顾问和投资者。他认为创业驱使美国经济，最好的风险资本家看到他们的作用，支持和挑战企业家的最佳表现。 Bill目前的投资焦点是推动商业，消费媒体和医疗保健领域的大数据革命。 Bill在西北大学法学院董事会任职，并获得了B.S.F.S.来自乔治城外交大学和J.D.从西北大学法学院。 MDV有超过14亿美元的管理和合作伙伴与企业家建筑师和建立成功的公司。 MDV投资于解决重大挑战和机遇的企业，包括个性化医疗。上市或被收购的MDV资助公司包括: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; 和 Zip2 (AltaVista).

trans-unit.source: Tim Chang is the Managing Director of the Mayfield Fund. Tim is a proven venture investor and experienced global executive. He was named on the 2011 Forbes Midas List of Top 100 Dealmakers and was featured by The Deal as one of five emerging VCs to watch. Tim invests in the mobile, gaming, digital media, and enterprise applications sectors. Prior to joining Mayfield Fund, Tim spent five years as a Partner at Norwest Venture Partners, and prior to Norwest, Tim worked for Gabriel Venture Partners, and as part of the founding team of CTR Ventures. Currently, Tim serves on the advisory boards of the Verizon 4G Venture Forum, Gamestop Corporation, Yoshimoto Kogyo, the Silicon Valley Telecom Council, MIT/Stanford VLAB, CasualConnect, and GamesBeat/MobileBeat. Tim holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, and an M.S. and B.S. from the University of Michigan. Mayfield is a global venture capital firm with over $2.6 billion under management and a 45-year history of championing entrepreneurs. Mayfield invests primarily in early-stage consumer and enterprise-facing IT companies. Since its founding in 1969, the firm has invested in more than 500 companies, resulting in over 110 IPOs and more than 150 mergers or acquisitions. For more information, visit www.mayfield.com
trans-unit.target: Tim Chang是梅菲尔德基金的管理总监。 Tim是一位目光敏锐的风险投资人和经验丰富的全球管理者。2011年Tim被列入福布斯百强投资人之一，并被评为五个新兴风险投资公司之一。Tim致力于投资移动，游戏，数字媒体和企业应用领域。在加入梅菲尔的基金之前，Tim在诺维斯特风险投资担任合伙人五年，在此之前，Tim也曾在加百列创投工作，同时也是CTR创投创始团队的一员。目前，Tim是威瑞森（Verizon）的4G创业论坛，Gamestop，Yoshimoto工业，硅谷电信委员会，麻省理工/斯坦福创业实验室，CasualConnect和GamesBeat/MobileBeat等公司的董事会成员。Tim拥有斯坦福大学商学院的工商管理硕士学位以及密歇根大学的理学学士和硕士学位。梅菲尔德是一家全球风险投资公司，管理着超过26亿美元资金，并拥有超过45年行业领先的经验。梅菲尔德主要投资于早期的面向企业用户的IT公司。自1969年成立以来，该公司已经投资了超过500家公司，超过110个公司实现了IPO，并成功地促成了超过150个并购。有关详细信息，请访问www.mayfield.com

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of Innovation Endeavors. Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology. From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy. Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman. Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer. Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG. Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novell, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems. Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.
trans-unit.target: 埃里克·施密特是谷歌的执行主席，也是Innovation Endeavors的创始人。自2001年加入谷歌以来，他一直致力于将其从硅谷创业公司发展成为全球技术领导者。从2001年到2011年，埃里克担任谷歌的首席执行官，负责技术和业务发展战略。埃里克从Novell加入谷歌，1997年4月至2001年7月担任首席执行官，并担任主席。在Novell之前，他在Sun Microsystems担任过多个职位，包括担任首席技术官和首席执行官。在1983年加入Sun之前，埃里克曾在Xerox Palo Alto研究中心（PARC）的计算机科学实验室担任研究员，并在贝尔实验室和ZiLOG担任职位。埃里克还曾担任新美国基金会，谷歌，Novell和InSight风险合作伙伴的主席，以及谷歌，苹果和Seibel系统公司的董事。埃里克也曾是英国科学技术总顾问委员会成员和总理顾问委员会成员。埃里克拥有普林斯顿大学电子工程师学士学位，同时有加州大学伯克利分校的计算机科学硕士学位和博士学位。

trans-unit.source: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.
trans-unit.target: 简单明了： 提问必须使用英文、简单明了，而且必须是有关于健康主题.

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.
trans-unit.target: 检查错字: 药物在不同的国家有不同的名字，请务必提供药物的通用名称。 我们在美国的医师们很少会回答他们不熟系的外国药物、或是回答关于他们没有访问过的其他国家的医院或医疗程序。

trans-unit.target: 24小时全天候，从电脑或移动装置上无限次数的医疗谘询!

trans-unit.source: Total peace of mind with a doctor always "on call" for you and your loved ones

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.
trans-unit.target: 问有意义的问题: 提问必须提供足够且详细的资讯. 举例来说(「头疼」)如果没有提供更详尽的资料，您的医师将无法正确的回答您的提问。 您可以考虑提及您的性别、年龄，症状持续时间或受影响的身体区域.

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.
trans-unit.target: 保护隐私：不要提及您的姓名、其他人的姓名或医生的姓名。

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 参考事项 想问一个好问题，参考以下事项

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
多给一些细节没有坏处。 Hide examples
Good: 我的手肘内部有一块干干的红疹，已经3周了。是什么引起的呢？
不太好的问题： 为什么我有红疹？

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
尽量描述多些细节来帮助其他人。世界各地的人们都可能看到您的问题，和医生的回答。 举例来说
好的问题： 什么可能引起后背下部疼痛呢，在我做完家务活后？我以前从未有过后背受伤。
不太好的问题： 为什么我后背疼？

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
指明您的性别，如果这可以提供更多信息。 举例来说
指明性别会有帮助： 什么会引起一个硬币大小的突起，在一个男人胸口下面？
不需要指明性别： 什么会引起一个豆子大的突起，在我手背的皮肤下面？

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
指明您的年龄。 举例来说
不同的年龄会导致不同回答： 过去2天，我15岁的儿子一直发烧，而且有点瘸好像脚疼似的。可能是什么引起的呢？
过去2天，我3岁的儿子一直发烧，而且有点瘸好像脚疼似的。可能是什么引起的呢？

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
指明体重和身高的单位。 举例来说
好的问题： 我儿子3岁大，27磅，34英寸高，这样在他的年龄正常吗？
不太好的问题： 我儿子3岁大，重27，高34，他这样正常吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
请指出药物的牌子和名称，尤其是如果你不在美国境内，或问到很不常见的药物。 举例来说
好的问题： 我儿子5岁大，55磅，一直发烧。他吃了5ml的泰诺 (扑热息痛120mg/5ml)，不过烧没退。这么大的孩子能够吃更多泰诺吗？
不太好的问题： 我儿子5岁大，重55，一直发烧。他吃了泰诺但是烧没退。能吃跟多药吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
试着避免问医生用是或不是回答的问题。 举例来说
好的问题： 抗生素对年轻在上学的孩子怎么样？
不太好的问题： 抗生素对孩子有用吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
尽量避免加入个人观点。 举例来说
好问题： 为什么有人会抗议使用疫苗，当疫苗可以用来治疗疾病的时候？
不太好的问题： 那些抗议疫苗的人是无知吗，还是只是不接受现实？

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
越清楚明白越好。注意语法，避免不雅词汇和俚语。 举例来说
好的问题： 我在做胳膊弯曲锻炼，突然肱二头肌特别疼。我可能伤到肌肉了吗？
不太好的问题： 做弯曲，感觉不对，胳膊疼，怎么回事？

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
不要假设医生知道你的病史，HealthTap医生通常看不到你之前的问题。 举例来说
好的问题： 我2岁的儿子2个月前做了耳管，现在发烧并且右耳有脓，这正常吗？
不太好的问题： 现在都2天了，脓会很快流完吗？

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
为了您的隐私，不要写您和其他人的真名。 (除非那是一个名人并且公开的谈论了一个问题。). 举例来说
好的问题： 我听说演员Michael J. Fox谈论了他的帕金森症。最近3年内有什么新的更好的治疗方法吗？
不太好的问题： 医生您好。我叫John Doe，想知道有什么治疗帕金森症的好办法吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
避免过多使用简写，那可能造成困惑。 举例来说
好的问题： 如果你的例假从来都不正常，你怎么知道是怀孕了呢？
不太好的问题： 例假都不正常，怎么就怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
请尽量使用英语问问题，HealthTap平台的英语医生最多。 举例来说
好的问题： 我上周末清理了一下后园，现在胳膊疼了2天了，这有关系吗？
不太好的问题： Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

trans-unit.resname: Start a Private Conversation Ask a more detailed question to a doctor of your choice here, in a private, HIPAA-secure one-on-one setting for a small fee. Add images, scans or supporting documents for an even more personalized answer.
trans-unit.source: Start a Private Conversation Ask a more detailed question to a doctor of your choice here, in a private, HIPAA-secure one-on-one setting for a small fee. Add images, scans or supporting documents for an even more personalized answer.
trans-unit.target: 开始一段私人对话 您可以选择医生，并询问更加私人和具体的问题，只需付一点费用，我们保证这是HIPAA安全的，并且是一对一咨询。可以添加图片，扫描，或其他文件来得到专门给您的回答。

trans-unit.target: 询问医生一个问题 您可以使用HealthTap的信用点数，来支付您直接选择医生并与其交谈的费用。

trans-unit.resname: REFER TO A COLLEAGUE Know someone who can answer this question? That’s great! Just let us know who and we’ll send it to them.
